pli-tv-bu-vb-pc18:1.18.1: I am here taking _kuṭi_ to refer to the upper story itself, rather than the whole building, which already has the separate name _vihāra_.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc18:2.3.7: Sp 2.133: _Tasmiṁ ṭhitoti āhaccapādake mañce vā pīṭhe vā ṭhito upari nāgadantakādīsu laggitakaṁ cīvaraṁ vā kiñci vā gaṇhāti vā, aññaṁ vā laggeti, tassāpi anāpatti_, “_Tasmiṁ ṭhito_: standing on the bed or bench with detachable legs, he takes hold of a robe or anything else hanging from a wall peg, etc., above, or he puts something up; for this too there is no offense.”
